spec_data.Name: perl-Config-Record
spec_data.Description:
Config::Record provides a module for loading configuration
records. It supports scalar, array and hash parameters nested
to an arbitrary depth.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:27:24 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl module for Configuration file access
